entry.title: WIND WARNING , Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pincher Creek Airport 09:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 51 %
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: W 37 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 this morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. A few flurries near the British Columbia border overnight. Local blowing snow near the British Columbia border overnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 70 gusting to 100 late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Local blowing snow near the British Columbia border in the morning. Amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
